Went with two others and we all loved everything we ate, with the Koong Karee as the table favorite. Eggplant salad was surprising and delicious.

Another location for the beloved taco spot from Chelsea Market. The line moves quickly. There are tables inside (to eat on the go), but no chairs. Food is fresh and everything is seasoned really well.
